sqlMap.update: update project set pro_video=#pro_video#, pro_content=#pro_content#, pro_link=#pro_link#, pro_image=#pro_image# where pro_no=#pro_no#
update project set Pro_fileImage=#Pro_fileImage#, Pro_fileIntro=#Pro_fileIntro#, Pro_address=#Pro_address#, Pro_fileSns=#Pro_fileSns# where pro_no=#pro_no#
update project set pro_bank=#pro_bank#, pro_account=#pro_account# where pro_no=#pro_no#
sqlMap.select: select pro_no,pro_video,su_count,now_amount,pro_goal, Pro_fileImage,Pro_fileIntro,Pro_fileSns, pro_content,Pro_image from project where pro_no=#pro_no#
select pro_no,pro_thumbnail,pro_title from project where m_id=#m_id#
select pro_no,pro_thumbnail,pro_title from project where upper(pro_title) like upper(#pro_title#)
select pro_thumbnail,pro_title,pro_content,pro_goal,pro_start from project order by sysdate
select pro_no,su_count, m_id,pro_thumbnail,pro_title,pro_content,pro_goal,pro_catagory,pro_start,pro_end from project order by su_count desc
select max(pro_no) from project where pro_state=0 and m_id=#m_id#
sqlMap.update: update project set su_count=su_count+1 where pro_no=#pro_no#
update project set now_amount=now_amount+#su_money# where pro_no=#pro_no#
